description.en:
In the Canglan Continent, there existed a rule: only those who managed to awaken a Martial Spirit were able to pursue the path of cultivation, and a Martial Spirit's rank was determined when it was awakened. Born in Linshui City, Qin Nan was a peerless genius who possessed great talents and was highly anticipated to become a great cultivator in the future. However, things changed when he ended up awakening the lowest-grade Martial Spirit, resulting in him being considered trash.  
  
Fortunately, when Qin Nan was struck by a ray of lightning at a young age, he coincidentally obtained the atavistic Divine Battle Spirit, which was capable of ranking up, breaking the ultimate rule of the Canglan Continent. Little did he know that his Martial Spirit possessed a great secret, which would continue to be unveiled as he learns more about the story of the Divine Battle Spirit.  
  
What is the secret behind the Divine Battle Spirit? What is the curse of the Canglan Continent? Who exactly is the Divine God of Battle?  
  
Join Qin Nan and his companions along their journey, battling against various opponents, outsmarting their enemies, and seeking the answers to unveil mysteries!  
  
“Master, please bring me along on your journey battling against the Nine Heavens, will you?”  
  
*From gravitytales.com

altTitles.ja: ナンバMG5
ナンバエムジーファイブ

description.en: Born in a family of delinquents, Nanba Tsuyoshi is expected to succeed his older brother as the strongest delinquent in school. Unbeknownst to his family, however, he decides to enroll in the top high school in town to live as a normal high schooler. Can he maintain his double life as the strongest delinquent in town and as a normal high schooler?

title.en: Veil Blue to Kuchinashi no Hanataba

altTitles.ja: ベールブルーと梔子の花束

altTitles.en: Veil Blue and Bouquet of Gardenias

description.en:
Mugi Hinata has had a physical relationship with Suku Oumi, a popular professional Go player, since their school days. They can only meet when in heat and have yet to become lovers. Even so, they are happy just to be together. Then one day, he witnesses shocking news about Oumi...?

High-spec Go player α × Servile bookshop clerk Ω, an Omegaverse story which is sure to make you swoon.

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?

title.en: My Female Disciples are all Future Masters of the Heavens

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Shots From the Future

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ De Nǚ Túdìmen Dōu Shì Wèilái Zhū Tiān Dà Lǎo

altTitles.zh: 我的女徒弟们都是未来诸天大佬

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Nü Tudi Men Dou Shi Weilai Zhu Tian Dalao

altTitles.zh-hk: 諸天聖者〜崩壊世界と女弟子〜

altTitles.tr: Kadın Çıraklarımın Hepsi Gelecekteki Büyük Tanrılar

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Ss From the Future

altTitles.vi: Các Nữ Đồ Đệ Của Ta Đều Là Chư Thiên Đại Lão Tương Lai

altTitles.es-la: Mis discípulas son las futuros grandezas de los cielos

description.en:
The historical timeline is facing collapse, and the strongest Taoist master was sent back to one hundred thousand years ago with his entire body of cultivation. Ding~ Your system-assigned mission is here, it's up to you to entice all the female apprentices!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/13619)
- [Official japanese (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82263)
description.tr: Tarihin uzun nehri çöküşle karşı karşıya, en güçlü Taoist rahip yüz bin yıl önceye geri döndü. Ding ~ Sistem görev verdi ve gelecekteki tanrıları çırağınız yapın!
description.zh: 历史长河面临崩溃，最强道尊带着一身修为回到十万年前？叮~您的系统任务到了，收服女徒弟的任务就交给你了！

title.en: I Was Immediately Mistaken for a Monster Genius Actor

altTitles.pt-br: Eu fui confundido como um ator gênio monstro

description.en:
One day, Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario, and to become the character himself through the subspace. 

And then, at an audition location where he followed his friend, he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspace…?
description.ko:
평범한 소시민 강우진에게 어느 날 갑자기대본이나 시나리오를 보면 아공간에 들어갈 수 있고,아공간을 통해 배역 자체가 될 수 있는 능력이 생긴다.

그리고 친구를 따라간 오디션 장소에서우연히 아공간을 통해 경험한 연기를 보여주게 되었는데…?

description.en: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?

altTitles.ja: Mコレクション

description.en: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

"Alma mater, home town, blood ties—they're all but a façade!" The war against organized crime waged by the government has failed miserably… And the world turned into a battlefield of mayhem ruled by one's fists. The one who unified this hell, Chairman of the Taejin Group, "Jin Young-ui," has decided to open a competition of man, "Festival of Warriors" in search for a successor. Will our unemployed thug "Kang Dae-oh" rise to the top of the pyramid?!

altTitles.ja: 上野くんは開発済み

description.en: "Spring! My college debut! The blossoming of my sexuality! Even now, I can't cum without being harassed by them." An unfortunate story in the spring of youth.
description.ja: 春! 大学デビューだ! 性癖開花だ! 未だに僕は、彼女たちにいじめられないと射精ができないんだ――。哀しきフルボッキ青春譚。

title.en: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends

altTitles.zh: 靠发小我变身顶级向导

description.en: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

altTitles.ja: ブラッククローバー

altTitles.th: แบล็กโคลเวอร์

description.en:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
description.fr:
Asta et Yuno ont été abandonné ensemble à la même église, et sont inséparables depuis. Enfants, ils promirent qu'ils seront en compétition pour voir qui sera le prochain Mage Empereur. Toutefois, en grandissant, quelques différences entre eux émergèrent. Yuno était un génie avec la magie avec un pouvoir et un contrôle incroyable, pendant qu'Asta ne pouvait pas du tout utiliser la magie, et essayait de compenser cela en entrainant son corps. Quand ils reçoivent leur grimoire à 15 ans, Yuno obtient ub kivre spectaculaire avec un trèfle à 4 feuilles (la plupart des gens reçoivent un trèfle à 3 feuilles), pendant qu'Asta ne reçoit rien du tout. Toutefois, quand Yuno fut menaçé, la vérité derrière le pouvoir d'Asta fut révélée. Il reçoit un grimoire avec un trèfle à 5 feuilles, un "trèfle noir" *(un "black clover")* ! Maintenant, les deux amis s'en vont vers la capitale, les deux cherchant le même objectif !


**Liens:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802)  *(special)* 
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) *(anime)*
description.pl: Asta to młody chłopak, który marzy o zostaniu największym magiem w królestwie. Jest tylko jeden problem: nie potrafi używać żadnej magii. Na szczęście otrzymuje Pięciolistną Koniczynę, niesamowicie rzadką księgę czarów, dzięki której chłopak zyskuje moc niwelowania wszelkiej magii. Czy ktoś, kto nie używa magii, może zostać Imperatorem Magii, magiem nad magami? Jedno wiemy na pewno: Asta nigdy się nie podda.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!
description.ru: В мире, где магия – это всё, рождается мальчик Астер, который не в состоянии использовать какую-либо магию. Ещё ребенком он был оставлен у порога бедной церкви. Сейчас ему 15, и, чтобы доказать свою силу и сдержать обещание, данное другу, он стремится стать Королём Чародеев!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!

description.en:
Stinky tofu, durian, surstromming’s era is over. have you heard? cooking that’s so bad that you could die on the spot! but skill is increasing!?

Tera, whose cooking boasts the best(?) taste in all dimensions, through the bravest yoo seungwoo’s help, has come to peaceful(?) earth.

Endure it! if you eat it and don’t die, your level will go up! and then on behalf of me, protect the earth!

‘Extraordinary restaurant’ is open even when the world is going to end.
description.ko:
취두부, 두리안, 수르스트뢰밍의 시대는 갔다.
들어는 봤는가? 문자 그대로 죽을 만큼 맛없는 요리!
하지만 능력이 오른다!?

전 차원 최고(?)의 맛을 자랑하는 테라의 요리가
최강의 용사, 유승우의 손에 의해 평화로운(?) 지구를 찾아온다.

인내하라! 먹고 죽지만 않으면 허약한 당신도 레벨이 쑥쑥!
그리고 나 대신 지구를 지켜라!


'괴식식당'은 세상이 멸망해도 영업합니다!

title.en: Choujigen Game Neptune: The Animation - Hello New World - Yuusha Hon

altTitles.en: Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Animation - Hello New World - Hero Book

altTitles.ja: 超次元ゲイム ネプテューヌ はろーにゅーわーるど 勇者本 (書籍)

altTitles.es-la: Subiendo de nivel con las mejores habilidades

description.en:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!

altTitles.ja: クールな妻のさーちゃん

description.en: A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.
description.es: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.es-la: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica com dois amigos de infância que um dia vão se casar e o processo que leva até esse ponto.

title.en: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero

altTitles.en: I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!

altTitles.es-la: Era más fuerte que el héroe así que oculté mi poder

altTitles.th: แกร่งเกินผู้กล้า แต่ซ่าไม่ได้

description.en:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

title.en: Ume to Momo no Futsuu no Kurashi

altTitles.ja: うめともものふつうの暮らし

description.en:
Ume and Momo, the two cat sisters, share their lives under one roof.
Their days may seem uneventful, but within those moments, they discover countless sources of happiness and joy.
description.ja:
ねこっぽい姉妹のうめとももは二人暮らし中。
なんでもない日々を積み重ねて、
嬉しいことや楽しいことをたくさん見つけていきます。

altTitles.ja: 水晶の少年

description.en:
A miraculous story that saves the world with the power of "stone"!

A mysterious power resides in the crystal possessed by Akira Amachi, a boy who is knowledgeable about stones. Using that power, Akira decides to solve various cases!     The first episode is about a train derailment! ? A train traveling at breakneck speed heads towards the collapsed railway bridge... Will Akira be able to save the people on the train??　
Akira's miraculous story begins now!!!

title.en: Shokuba no Onnanoko ni Toushisuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 職場の女の子に投資する話

altTitles.en: A Story About Investing in a Girl at the Workplace

description.en:
Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games.
Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things.
When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink.
A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy!

(Source: Melonbooks, edited)
description.ja: 街の書店「BOOK FOREST」で店長を務める畑本育人は、ゲームの「推し」キャラに課金してしまうオタク気質。バイトリーダーの轟ミランは、店長に憧れるものの、データに課金することだけは理解できない。「オレにとって課金は投資だ」と話す育人に、「それならあたしにも投資…して?」と話すミランだが…。投資と還元を繰り返し、2人の心の距離が揺れ動く――新感覚の投資ラブコメ！

altTitles.th: ความยิ่งใหญ่ในศิลปะการต่อสู้

description.en: True Heavens Continent is a place where those with great power can move mountains and overturn seas, kick the stars and step on the moon, punch through the sky and even shatter the earth itself! Ye Ming, a commoner born into a side branch within his family, sincerely and diligently tried to become stronger, hoping to avenge his parents’ deaths. As fate would have it, he obtained the "Divine Spirit Cloak", ingested the "Foundation Establishment Divine Pill", and cultivated the "Omnipotent Sutra". With his newfound power, Ye Ming begins his path of vengeance, mercilessly slaughtering any martial artists that dare stand in his way!In the face of deadly threats all across the continent, such as the Immortal Dynasty, the Great Eternal Sect, the Giant Barren Demon, and the Supreme Demon God, Ye Ming is determined that nothing will stop him! Whether god or demon, Ye Ming fears nothing! “I shall be the one who decides my own destiny!”
description.es: Ye Ming, a estrela em ascensão da Família Ye é considerado um gênio entre seus companheiros. Mas ele foi enganado por seu primo ciumento e ele cortou seus meridianos, aleijou suas habilidades e o abanou impiedosamente. Mas Ye Ming nunca desiste, porque ele sacrificaria tudo para se vingar de seus pais falecidos que foram assassinados pela família Huang. Mas ele não sabe que é considerado uma dor no pescoço para a família Ye, e uma grande conspiração paira na escuridão…
description.ru: Мин Е, восходящая звезда семьи Е, - гений среди своих сверстников-культиваторов. Но его двоюродный брат повредил ему меридианы, искалечил и безжалостно порезал сухожилия. Мин Е не сдается, потому что он пожертвовал бы всем, чтобы отомстить за своих умерших родителей, которые были убиты семьей Хуан. Он не знает, что его считают занозой в шее для семьи Е и хотят его убрать…
description.zh: 天元大陆，有大能力者可移山倒海，踢星踏月，拳破青天，脚碎大地！ 叶铭，一介凡流，庶子出身，为报血仇，自强不息。 机缘之下，获“神灵宝衣”，服“筑基神丹”，修“通天经图”。 心诚志竖，勇猛精进，凡挡修武之路者，杀无赦！ 不朽皇朝，万古大教，洪荒巨妖，擎天魔神，面对这漫天神魔，他无所畏惧，我命在我不在天
description.pt-br: O True Heavens Continent é um lugar onde aqueles com grande poder podem mover montanhas e derrubar mares, chutar as estrelas e pisar na lua, perfurar o céu e até mesmo destruir a própria terra! Ye Ming, um plebeu nascido em um ramo secundário de sua família, tentou sincera e diligentemente se tornar mais forte, na esperança de vingar a morte de seus pais. Como quis o destino, ele obteve a “Capa do Espírito Divino”, ingeriu a “Pílula Divina do Estabelecimento de Fundação” e cultivou o “Sutra Onipotente”. Com seu novo poder, Ye Ming inicia seu caminho de vingança, massacrando impiedosamente qualquer artista marcial que ouse ficar em seu caminho! Diante de ameaças mortais em todo o continente, como a Dinastia Imortal, a Grande Seita Eterna, o Gigante Estéril Demônio, e o Deus Demônio Supremo, Ye Ming está determinado a que nada o deterá! Seja deus ou demônio, Ye Ming não teme nada! “Serei eu quem decidirá meu próprio destino!

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合
SERVAMP-サーヴァンプ-

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

description.en: Short manga posted by Imo Ichirou [@cheesesama24] on Twitter.

title.en: Con Cafe Jou wa Koi wo Kiru

altTitles.ja: コンカフェ嬢は恋を着る

description.en: Tsumugu Osaka, is a huge fan of clothes and aspires to become a fashion designer. One day, she meets a con cafe girl in Kabukicho and ends up working as a new cast member. What happens when she can only "talk about clothes" with people she meets for the first time?
description.ja: 服が大大大好きでファッションデザイナーを目指している主人公・逢坂紡（あいさかつむぐ）。ある日、歌舞伎町でコンカフェ嬢と出会ったのをきっかけに、新人キャストとして働くことに。初対面の人とは「服の話」しかできないのに……どうなる!?

altTitles.ja: メンヘラ主人公を忠犬にしました

altTitles.en: After The Wake Up of Abusive Female

description.en: A young woman with a philandering fiancé—she's caught him cheating multiple times, yet her timid nature keeps her from speaking up. But when heartbreak consumes her, she suddenly regains memories of her past life and realizes she’s a transmigrator in a novel, doomed to play the tragic heroine in a melodrama? No thanks! Whoever wants that sob-fest of a role can have it. She’s made up her mind—she’ll be the first to flip the script and take down the scumbag male lead!
description.zh: 漫画简介: 救命！！！穿成虐文女主刚把渣男主踹掉，竟然又来了个强制爱文的病娇男主！！！

title.en: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui! - Nemo no Anal wa Pink Iro (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja-ro: (Motenaishi Sokubaikai Suru 4) Nemo's Anus is Pink (Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!)

altTitles.ja: (モテないし即売会する4) ネモのアナルはピンク色 (私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!)

description.en: A Nemoto x Tomoko doujin.

altTitles.ja: いちごの入ったソーダ水

description.en:
Mannenrou Ladies' Academy is famous for its upper class and posh students.
Despite knowing how out-of-place she'd be, the former yankee, Hanaizumi Luna, decides to enroll there.
Moreover, according to her underling: "Girls' schools means yuri!! Add in school dormitories? Now that's a world of girl on girl action!!"

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.he: צ'יהירו הצעיר מבלה את ימיו באימונים תחת הדרכתו של אביו, מחשל החרבות המפורסם. יום אחד, הוא מקווה להפוך בעצמו ליצרן חרבות דגול. האב המשעשע והבן הרציני--הם חשבו שהימים האלו יימשכו לנצח. אבל לפתע, הטרגדיה מכה. יום אפל ספוג בדם. צ'יהירו וחרבו חיים כעת רק למען הנקמה.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

altTitles.vi: Hijiri-kun Chỉ Muốn Sống Thanh Liêm

description.en: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

description.en: Akira Azuma is a tall, attractive, but aloof Kusunoki High School freshman girl and all-around athlete. Hiyori Motohashi is a short Kusunoki freshman girl in the school's broadcasting club. While trying to set up coverage on Akira, Hiyori finds herself attracted to Akira's mysterious charm.
description.pt-br: Azuma Akira é alta, tem boa aparência, é boa em todos os esportes, e é o centro das atenções no momento da escola Kusonoki. Motohashi Hiyori é uma caloura no clube de jornalismo da escola Kusunoki. Sua primeira tarefa no clube é entrevistar Akira, ela se encanta pelo jeito misterioso de Akira e decide que vai conseguir entrevistá-la de qualquer jeito! … Será que ela vai conseguir?

altTitles.th: มายฮีโร่ อคาเดเมีย

altTitles.ja: 僕のヒーローアカデミア

description.en:
One day, a four-year-old boy came to a sudden realization: the world is not fair. Eighty percent of the world's population wield special abilities, known as "quirks," which have given many the power to make their childhood dreams of becoming a superhero a reality. Unfortunately, Izuku Midoriya was one of the few born without a quirk, suffering from discrimination because of it. Yet, he refuses to give up on his dream of becoming a hero; determined to do the impossible, Izuku sets his sights on the elite hero training academy, UA High.  
  
However, everything changes after a chance meeting with the number one hero and Izuku's idol, All Might. Discovering that his dream is not a dead end, the powerless boy undergoes special training, working harder than ever before. Eventually, this leads to him inheriting All Might's power, and with his newfound abilities, gets into his school of choice, beginning his grueling journey to become the successor of the best hero on the planet.

---

**Note: Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of My Hero Academia are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/my-hero-academia) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free at the below link.**
description.es:
Un día, un niño de cuatro años se dio cuenta de repente: el mundo no es justo. El 80% de la población mundial posee habilidades especiales, conocidas como «quirks», que han dado a muchos el poder de hacer realidad sus sueños infantiles de convertirse en superhéroes. Por desgracia, Izuku Midoriya fue uno de los pocos que nació sin una «quirk», sufriendo discriminación por ello. Sin embargo, se niega a renunciar a su sueño de convertirse en un héroe; decidido a hacer lo imposible, Izuku pone sus miras en la academia de entrenamiento de héroes de élite, UA High.  
  
Sin embargo, todo cambia tras un encuentro casual con el héroe número uno e ídolo de Izuku, All Might. Al descubrir que su sueño no es un callejón sin salida, el chico sin poderes se somete a un entrenamiento especial, esforzándose más que nunca. Finalmente, esto le lleva a heredar el poder de All Might y, con sus nuevas habilidades, consigue entrar en la escuela de su elección, comenzando su agotador viaje para convertirse en el sucesor del mejor héroe del planeta.
description.fr:
Dans un monde où 80 % de la population possède un super-pouvoir appelé alter, les héros font partie de la vie quotidienne. Et les super-vilains aussi ! Face à eux se dresse l’invincible All Might, le plus puissant des héros ! Le jeune Izuku Midoriya en est un fan absolu. Il n’a qu’un rêve : entrer à la Hero Academia pour suivre les traces de son idole.
Le problème, c’est qu’il fait partie des 20 % qui n’ont aucun pouvoir…

Son destin est bouleversé le jour où sa route croise celle d’All Might en personne ! Ce dernier lui offre une chance inespérée de voir son rêve se réaliser. Pour Izuku, le parcours du combattant ne fait que commencer !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Манга повествует о мире, где больший процент населения человечества рождается с необычной способностью (называется это - причуда), но наш главный герой в этот процент не попал. И по всем законам жанра неудачник сам упорно пытается достичь небывалой силы и приблизиться к своей мечте - стать супергероем.
description.vi:
Thế giới trở nên tràn ngập những người sở hữu một thứ siêu năng lực gọi là "Kosei"! Các "Siêu anh hùng" xuất hiện chống lại những tên tội phạm "Villain" chuyên lợi dụng "Kosei" để lộng hành. Sức mạnh áp đảo của họ làm nhiều người vô cùng ngưỡng mộ. Nhân vật chính là cậu bé Midoriya Izuku (tên thường gọi là "Deku") cũng ôm ấp giấc mơ trở thành "Siêu anh hùng"....!?

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.es-la:
Un día, un niño de cuatro años se dio cuenta de repente: el mundo no es justo. El 80% de la población mundial posee habilidades especiales, conocidas como «quirks», que han dado a muchos el poder de hacer realidad sus sueños infantiles de convertirse en superhéroes. Por desgracia, Izuku Midoriya fue uno de los pocos que nació sin una «quirk», sufriendo discriminación por ello. Sin embargo, se niega a renunciar a su sueño de convertirse en un héroe; decidido a hacer lo imposible, Izuku pone sus miras en la academia de entrenamiento de héroes de élite, UA High.  
  
Sin embargo, todo cambia tras un encuentro casual con el héroe número uno e ídolo de Izuku, All Might. Al descubrir que su sueño no es un callejón sin salida, el chico sin poderes se somete a un entrenamiento especial, esforzándose más que nunca. Finalmente, esto le lleva a heredar el poder de All Might y, con sus nuevas habilidades, consigue entrar en la escuela de su elección, comenzando su agotador viaje para convertirse en el sucesor del mejor héroe del planeta.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde quase toda a população possui algum poder sobre-humano, Izuku Midoriya é um dos poucos casos de pessoas comuns. Mas esse não é o maior de seus problemas. Exatamente por ser desprovido de qualquer poder, Izuku sofre constantemente nas mãos de seus colegas de classe. Nesse mundo fictício, desde o primeiro caso constatado de um recém-nascido com algum tipo de poder, o índice de criminalidade cresceu proporcional ao surgimento de heróis com as mais variadas capacidades. E, como não poderia deixar de ser, o sonho de Izuku é se tornar um super-herói. Isso parecia impossível, até o dia que ele ajuda o poderoso All Might na captura de um vilão gosmento. Ao demonstrar grande coragem e um forte senso de justiça, com a ajuda do famoso herói de cabelos louros, o garoto enfim terá a chance de se tornar quem sempre sonhou!

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.ja: 雨夜の月

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
description.ja:
2人の少女の、目には見えないもの、かけがえのないこと。

金田一咲希は高校入学直前のある日、ピアノレッスンに向かう途中で見知らぬ同世代の少女とぶつかり手を擦りむくが、相手から無言のまま真っすぐに見つめられた後、落とした楽譜を丁寧に拾われ絆創膏をもらう。咲希は印象的だったその少女とクラスメイトとして再会し、名前が及川奏音、そして耳が不自由だと知る。学校では障害を理由に周囲と距離を置く奏音に、淋しさを覚えた咲希はどうにか分かり合おうとし、そんな彼女の姿に奏音の態度も次第に変わっていき…。
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

altTitles.ja: ふるまぷら

description.en: Energetic girl Kyou meets quiet girl Makoto, who only communicates using sign boards numbered 1 to 10. At first, these polar opposites interact rather one-sidedly, but gradually become able to understand each other's feelings.
description.pt-br: A garota animada Kyou conhece a garota quieta Makoto, que só se comunica usando placas de numeradas de 1 a 10. No início, estes polos opostos interagem muito unilateralmente, mas gradualmente se tornam capazes de compreender os sentimentos uma da outra.

altTitles.ja: みにくい遊郭の子

altTitles.en: Ugly Duckling of the Entertainment District

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng xấu xí ở Phố Đèn Đỏ

description.en:
An abandoned high school girl becomes an Oiran in a strange world—

Esora, a high school girl who lost her place, found herself in an unknown red light district. She was sold to a slave buyer at the Yukaku "Sagamiya". The owner, Sagami, told her that Ishe could be the number one Oiran there.
description.ja: 居場所を失った女子高生エソラは、気がつくと知らない花街にいた。人買いに売られやってきたのは、遊郭「相模屋」。その主人である相模に、ここで1番の花魁になれると言われ―。幻想的な世界観で描かれる異世界花魁物語。
description.vi:
Một nữ sinh trung học bị bỏ rơi trở thành Oiran (kỹ nữ cao cấp) ở một thế giới xa lạ—
Esora, một nữ sinh trung học bị mất chỗ ở, thấy mình đang ở một khu đèn đỏ vô danh. Cô bị bán cho một người mua nô lệ ở Phố đèn đỏ "Sagamiya". Người chủ, Sagami, nói với cô rằng nếu cô trở thành Oiran thì sẽ có thể làm lại cuộc đời.

altTitles.ja: きみの横顔を見ていた
Kimi no Yokogao o Miteita

altTitles.en: I See Your Face, Turned Away

description.en: Hikari's your typical freshmen in high school who's been recently daydreaming about Mari’s, her shy best friend, a love story. She decides to ship Mari with Ootani-kun, their classmate, after finding out about his crush on Mari when his friend, Asagiri-kun, tried getting the two to talk. The main character is Mari, the leading man is Ootani, and Hikari is the typical best friend in the story. Not bad… right? A youthful story between four kids going through unrequited love.
description.fr:
Nous suivons le quotidien de quatre lycéens, deux filles et deux garçons, sur leur amitié parfois compliquée et leur amour non-partagé.

Hikari et Mari sont deux lycéennes qui s'entendent bien et qui sont amies. Hikari est une jeune fille plutôt banale et assez transparente alors que Mari est lumineuse. Elles se rapprochent petit à petit de Otani, un garçon bruyant et populaire et de son ami, Asagari, qui est plus calme et posé.
description.pt-br: Hikari é a típica caloura do ensino médio que recentemente sonhou acordada com a história de amor de Mari, sua tímida melhor amiga. Ela decide shippar Mari com Ootani-kun, seu colega de classe, depois de descobrir sobre sua paixão por Mari quando seu amigo, Asagiri-kun, tentou fazer os dois conversarem. A personagem principal é Mari, o protagonista é Ootani e Hikari é a típica melhor amiga da história. Nada mal... certo? Uma história juvenil entre quatro crianças passando por um amor não correspondido.

title.en: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.

altTitles.ja: 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro ha Wakaranai.

altTitles.en: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman's Heart.
I Can See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Don’t Know What a Woman's Mind Is Like

altTitles.id: Sekarang saya dapat melihat masa depan dalam beberapa menit, tetapi saya tidak dapat memahami hati seorang wanita.

altTitles.pt-br: Agora, posso ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas ainda não consigo entender o coração de uma mulher.

altTitles.vi: Tôi Giờ Có Thể Nhìn Thấy Vài Khắc Trong Tương Lai, Nhưng Vẫn Không Thể Hiểu Được Con Gái Nghĩ Gì

description.en: Arata Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arata doesn't realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.
description.id: Arase Itou bisa melihat beberapa menit ke depan. Namun, masa depan yang ia lihat selalu berhubungan dengan masalah. Arase yang baik hati berusaha menghindari masa depan yang tidak menyenangkan ini, namun pada akhirnya masalah tersebut tetap membuatnya membantu berbagai gadis dengan masalah mereka. Tanpa ia sadari, para gadis mulai menyukainya. Arase tidak menyadari bahwa, diam-diam, para gadis bersaing untuk memperebutkannya.
description.ja:
伊藤新世は数分後の未来が分かる。ただし視える未来は不幸につながるもの。
お人好しな新世はそんな不都合な未来を回避し、様々な悩みを持つ少女を助けることになる。
新世は知らない。いつの間にか、少女たちに好かれていることに。
新世は気づかない。人知れず、少女たちが争っていることに。
description.vi: Arata Itou có khả năng nhìn thấy trước vài phút trong tương lai, nhưng những hình ảnh cậu thấy luôn gắn liền với xui xẻo. Là một người tốt bụng, Arata quyết định tận dụng năng lực "bất tiện" này để giúp đỡ các cô gái đang gặp khó khăn và ngăn chặn những điều không may sẽ xảy ra với họ. Thế nhưng, cậu hoàn toàn không nhận ra rằng các cô gái ngày càng có tình cảm với mình. Càng không hay biết về những "cuộc chiến ngầm" giữa họ để giành lấy sự chú ý của cậu.
description.pt-br: Arata Itou tem a habilidade de ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas as visões que ele tem estão sempre ligadas a infortúnios. Com seu coração bondoso, Arata decide usar esse poder inconveniente para ajudar as garotas que enfrentam diversos problemas e evitar seus futuros infelizes. No entanto, Arata não percebe que, pouco a pouco, as garotas começam a se afeiçoar a ele. E ele continua alheio às rivalidades silenciosas que estão se formando entre elas por causa da sua atenção.

description.en:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3166015)
- Promotional video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/YmCRdVGAOPk)
- Songs accompanying the chapters - [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoEbYVmn3Vy_q874VMUq41Q/video)

altTitles.ja: 王子様の友達
A Prince of a Friend
学園の王子様とハグする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen no Ouji-sama to Hagu Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story About Hugging the School Prince

altTitles.pt-br: A história sobre abraçar o príncipe da escola

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

altTitles.zh-ro: Dou Po Cang Qiong Zhi Da Zhu Zai
Dòu Pò Cāng Qióng Zhī Dà Zhǔ Zǎi

description.en:
The Great Thousand World. It is a place where numerous planes intersect, a place where many clans live and a place where a group of lords assemble. The Heavenly Sovereigns appear one by one from the Lower Planes and they will all display a legend that others would desire as they pursue the road of being a ruler in this boundless world.  
  
In the Endless Fire Territory that the Flame Emperor controls, thousands of fire blazes through the heavens.  
  
Inside the Martial Realm, the power of the Martial Ancestor frightens the heaven and the earth.  
  
At the West Heaven Temple, the might of the Emperor of a Hundred Battles is absolute.  
  
In the Northern Desolate Hill, a place filled with thousands of graves, the Immortal Owner rules the world.  
  
A boy from the Northern Spiritual Realm comes out, riding on a Nine Netherworld Bird, as he charges into the brilliant and diverse world. Just who can rule over their destiny of their path on becoming a Great Ruler? In the Great Thousand World, many strive to become a Great Ruler.  
  
*Note : The Comic Format Change From Normal Page to Longstrip Starting at Chapter 84,*
description.vi: Trong đại thiên thế giới, nơi các vị diện giao thoa, vạn tộc lập quần hùng, lần lượt là những thiên vương từ các hạ vị diện, trong đại thiên thế giới này, đang lập nên những huyền thoại mà mọi người khao khát, theo đuổi chúa tể chi lộ. Đạo tranh phía trước, ta chính là đại chúa tể!

title.en: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスの大嫌いな女子と結婚することになった。

altTitles.en: I Got Married to the Girl I Hate Most in Class

altTitles.zh-hk: 我要和班裡我最討厭的妹子結婚了。

altTitles.vi: Kết Hôn Với Đứa Con Gái Mà Tôi Ghét Nhất Trong Lớp

description.en:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school.

"If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I'll kill you."
"I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that."

Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...
description.ja: 「私と結婚してること、クラスのみんなに言ったら殺すから」これは嫌い合っている二人がお互いを知り、本当の夫婦になるまでの物語。
description.vi:
Học sinh trung học Hojo Saito đã kết hôn với bạn cùng lớp của mình, Sakuramori Akane, cô gái mà cậu xem là kẻ thù lớn nhất trong trường.
“Nếu cậu nói với cả lớp rằng chúng ta đã kết hôn, tớ sẽ giết cậu.”
“Tớ cũng không muốn họ biết đâu. Chẳng có ích gì cả.”
Cuộc sống hôn nhân của họ không diễn ra suôn sẻ và họ thường xuyên xung đột. Tuy nhiên, khi họ cùng trải qua những ngày tháng thường nhật, khoảng cách giữa hai người dần thu hẹp lại, họ có nhiều khoảnh khắc vui vẻ bên nhau hơn, và dần dần bắt đầu hiểu nhau hơn. Saito bắt đầu khám phá ra những khía cạnh dễ thương của Akane mà trước đây cậu chưa từng thấy, còn Akane cũng từ từ nhận ra những cảm xúc mà cô ấy đã giữ kín bấy lâu...
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio Hojo Saito se casou com sua colega de classe, Sakuramori Akane, a garota que é seu pior inimigo na escola. 

“Se você contar ao resto da turma que somos casados, eu mato você” 

“Eu também não quero que eles saibam. Não há sentido nisso. ” 

A vida de recém-casados não estava indo muito bem e eles estavam constantemente em conflito. No entanto, à medida que avançam em suas vidas diárias, a distância entre eles diminui, eles passam momentos mais agradáveis juntos e, aos poucos, passam a se entender. Saito aprende sobre o lado fofo de Akane, que ele nunca tinha visto antes, e Akane gradualmente começou a reconhecer os sentimentos que ela estava guardando… 

A vida de recém-casado comovente de duas pessoas que simplesmente não conseguem ser honestas uma com a outra começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: 君ノ声

description.en:
A man with the ability to hear inner voices got married to a girl who can't speak.  
  
It's the Taisho era. Kyogoku Kazunari, who can hear people's inner voices, makes skillful use of his ability by running a trading company.  
His business is going well, but due to his power, he cannot trust others and has been quite bitter so far.   
Wanting to make use of their connections, Kazunari has propposed to marry the daughter of the noble Suwabe family. However, not only can he not hear the inner voice of his partner Suwabe Nana, she is also unable to speak.  
While Kazunari is bewildered, the two of them get married on the spur of the moment…? A clumsy but happy married life begins for them.
description.id:
Seorang pria dengan kemampuan untuk mendengar suara hati menikah dengan seorang gadis yang tidak dapat berbicara.
  
Ini adalah era Taisho. Kyogoku Kazunari, yang dapat mendengar suara hati orang, memanfaatkan kemampuannya dengan terampil dengan menjalankan perusahaan perdagangan.
Bisnisnya berjalan dengan baik, tetapi karena kekuatannya, dia tidak dapat mempercayai orang lain dan telah cukup pahit sejauh ini.
Ingin memanfaatkan koneksi mereka, Kazunari telah melamar putri dari keluarga bangsawan Suwabe. Namun, tidak hanya dia tidak dapat mendengar suara batin pasangannya Suwabe Nana, dia juga tidak dapat berbicara.
Sementara Kazunari bingung, mereka berdua menikah mendadak…? Kehidupan pernikahan yang canggung tapi bahagia dimulai untuk mereka.

title.en: Touhou - MariAri ga Kosodate wo Suru Hanashi (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Touhou dj - MariAri ga Kosodate wo Suru Hanashi

description.en: Part of [Touhou](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=touho) series.

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Kiraware Kizoku ni Koi wo suru

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢は嫌われ貴族に恋をする

altTitles.en: The Villainess Falls for the Notorious Noble

altTitles.ru: Злодейка влюбляется в печально известного дворянин

altTitles.id: Putri Jahat Jatuh Cinta Pada Bangsawan yang Dibenci

altTitles.zh-hk: 惡役千金和被討厭的貴族陷入愛河

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật phản diện tái sinh vào thế giới quý tộc khét tiếng

description.en:
Aikawa Eri dies in a traffic accident after staying up all night playing an otome game. She reincarnates as Eris, the villainess of her favorite game. In order to avoid the bad end, she tries her best to change the story, but as expected, it’s hard to rewrite fate…

She is abandoned by the prince. Even more, her life almost ends when she is attacked by a gang of thugs, but a young man appears…

Will the antisocial prince change her destiny? This is the reincarnated villainess’s rebirth romance fantasy!
description.ja:
破滅の運命を変えるのは、日陰者? 転生悪役令嬢の復活恋愛ファンタジー!

乙女ゲームの徹夜プレイ明けに交通事故に遭い、異世界に、しかもゲーム内の悪役令嬢エリスとして転生してしまった愛川絵里。
BAD ENDを回避すべく「誰からも好かれる」エリスになろうと奔走した彼女だったが、やはり運命を変えることはできず……。
王子に捨てられ、さらに暴漢に襲われ人生が終わろうとしたとき、一人の青年が現れ――。

破滅へ向かう運命を変えるのは、日陰者の王子様? 転生悪役令嬢の復活恋愛ファンタジー!
description.ru: Айкава Эри умерла, попав в дорожно-транспортное происшествия после того, как не спала всю ночь, играя в отомэ-игру. После аварии она переродилась в теле главной злодейки своей любимой игры, которую зовут Эрида. Чтобы избежать плохой концовки, девушка изо всех сил старается изменить историю, но как оказалось, переписывать судьбу очень сложно. Всё пошло не так, как она хотела. И когда она оказалась на волоске от смерти, Эриду спас прекрасный молодой человек. Что же её ждёт дальше? Это история о перерождении в главную злодейку отомэ-игры!
description.vi:
Aikawa Eri chết trong một vụ tai nạn giao thông sau khi thức cả đêm để chơi game otome. Cô tái sinh thành Eris, nhân vật phản diện trong trò chơi yêu thích của cô. Để tránh dẫn đến kết cục tồi tệ, cô ấy đã cố gắng hết sức để thay đổi câu chuyện, nhưng đúng như dự đoán, khó mà có thể viết lại số phận…

Cô bị hoàng tử bỏ rơi. Thậm chí, cuộc sống của cô gần như kết thúc khi cô bị một nhóm côn đồ tấn công , nhưng một người đàn ông trẻ đã xuất hiện…

Liệu chàng hoàng tử chống đối có thay đổi được vận mệnh của cô? Đây là ảo tưởng lãng của nhân vật phản diện được tái sinh!

altTitles.ja: 聖巫女の守護者
聖巫女（シアリズ）の守護者

description.de: Eine Meister-Sklaven-Fantasie zwischen dem Wächter, der seine Geliebte verloren hat, und der legendären Heiligen! Sabi, der in seiner Stadt als Ketzer geächtet wird, trifft Alice, ein Mädchen mit einem besonderen Schicksal. Alice wählt Sabi als ihren Partner – den „Guardian“ –, allerdings verliert sie ihr Leben durch einen seltsamen Vorfall in der Stadt. Doch plötzlich erwacht sie mit der Seele der erhabenen „Heiligen“, die in ihr wohnt, wieder zum Leben…?!
description.en: A master-slave fantasy between the guardian who lost his beloved and the legendary saint! Sabi, who is shunned as a heretic in his town, meets Alice, a girl with a special fate. Alice chooses Sabi as her partner— the “Guardian” —but she loses her life to a strange incident in the town. But she suddenly comes back to life with the soul of the exalted “Holy Saint” that resides inside her...?!
description.ja: 愛する人を失った守護者×伝説の巫女、主従ファンタジー！町で異端者とよばれるサビは、特別な運命を背負った少女・アリスと出会う。選ばれしパートナー・“守護者”にサビを選ぼうとするアリスだが、町の怪異により命を落としてしまう。突如息を吹き返した彼女に宿ったのは、なんと伝説の“聖巫女”の魂で――!?

title.en: Yuri Yuri Panic ~Toutosugiru Jian ga Hasseishiteimasu!~

altTitles.ja: ゆりゆりぱにっく～尊すぎる事案が発生しています！～

altTitles.en: Yuri Yuri Panic ~ An Extremely Precious Affair has Begun!~

description.en: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...? A girl-meets-girl school romantic comedy where a girl and her yuri-brained imaginary friend Omochi get caught up in a precious affair!!
